trans-unit.source: Defines the attributes of a font

seg-source.mrk: Defines the attributes of a font

target.mrk: Defines the attributes of a font

trans-unit.source: Height, in logical units, of the font's character cell or character

seg-source.mrk: Height, in logical units, of the font's character cell or character

target.mrk: Height, in logical units, of the font's character cell or character

trans-unit.source: Specifies the average width, in logical units, of characters in the font

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the average width, in logical units, of characters in the font

target.mrk: Specifies the average width, in logical units, of characters in the font

trans-unit.source: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between the escapement vector and the X axis

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between the escapement vector and the X axis

target.mrk: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between the escapement vector and the X axis

trans-unit.source: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between each character's base line and the X axis

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between each character's base line and the X axis

target.mrk: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between each character's base line and the X axis

trans-unit.source: Specifies the weight of the font in the range 0 through 1000

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the weight of the font in the range 0 through 1000

target.mrk: Specifies the weight of the font in the range 0 through 1000

trans-unit.source: Specifies an italic font if set to True

seg-source.mrk: Specifies an italic font if set to True

target.mrk: Specifies an italic font if set to True

trans-unit.source: Specifies an underlined font if set to True

seg-source.mrk: Specifies an underlined font if set to True

target.mrk: Specifies an underlined font if set to True

trans-unit.source: Specifies a strikeout font if set to True

seg-source.mrk: Specifies a strikeout font if set to True

target.mrk: Specifies a strikeout font if set to True

trans-unit.source: Specifies the pitch and family of the font

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the pitch and family of the font

target.mrk: Specifies the pitch and family of the font

trans-unit.source: Specifies the typeface name of the font

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the typeface name of the font

target.mrk: Specifies the typeface name of the font
